description.en:
Casino Betting Coin is an ERC-20 and BEP-20 cryptocurrency designed to supercharge iGaming and NFT gaming via the blockchain. Its team works closely with some of the biggest companies in the gaming space to create real-world utility designed to benefit both customers and operators.

Supported by a team of blockchain and igaming industry veterans, CBCnetwork is pioneering new use cases for the technology with a focus on building customer loyalty, engagement, and NFT gaming for some of the world’s most successful brands. For more information about CBCnetwork, please visit: http://cbc.network/.
